# Beginner: Add a meta description to the HTML head

Description
--
Add or update a meta description tag in the app's root layout/head (e.g. `src/app/layout.js` or other head area) that provides a short summary for the landing page (around 120 characters).

Acceptance criteria
--
- A `<meta name="description" content="...">` tag is added or updated in the project head/layout.
- The content is concise and describes the IEEE Dholakpur event.

Notes
--
- This change is safe and only affects SEO/preview text.
